content: hi there am looking for more information on bluethistle ai

BlueThistle AI offers various AI packages with different pricing structures such as the Basic AI Package with a Setup Fee of £500 and a Monthly Retainer of £750 (optional), the Advanced AI Package with a Setup Fee of £750 and a Monthly Retainer of £1,200 (optional), and the 24/7 AI Support Package with a Setup Fee of £1,000 and a Monthly Retainer of £1,500 (optional)【5†source】. For more detailed information, you can visit their website or contact them directly via email at Team@Bluethistleai.co.uk or phone at +44 7721 843189【5†source】.
awesome and how long does this take to steup

The setup timeframes for BlueThistle AI packages are as follows:
- Basic AI Package: 2 to 3 weeks.
- Advanced AI Package: 4 to 6 weeks.
- 24/7 AI Support Package: 6 to 8 weeks.
All packages include a follow-up 1 week after delivery【5†source】.
where can i book a consultation
You can book a consultation with BlueThistle AI by visiting their Consultation page at: https://bluethistleai.co.uk/consultation/【5†source】.
You can reach BlueThistle AI via email at Team@Bluethistleai.co.uk or by phone at +44 7721 843189. Their office hours are Monday to Friday from 9 AM to 6 PM and Saturday from 9 AM to 4 PM【5†source】.
